about_the_game:
Explore your way through mystical islands while learning about your characters past. In this short adventure game you play as the protagonist of a memoire, telling a story from the pacific in the late 1800 century.

The game requires roomscale interactions and a play area of at least 2x2 m.

Finishing the game takes around 30 minutes to 2 hours depending on how you play.
We recommend taking your time, playing the game without stress in a calm environment.

We hope you like it!

About us:
The Snigelsoft team contains of three friends Jonas, Daniel and John. We have done the game as a side project on our spare time. Our hope is to have time to continue making the game, finishing all the parts, and with your help maybe even do it more professionally :-)

Features include:
Voice acted story, Immersive environment, Beautiful soundtrack by film score composer

content_descriptors.notes: Contains drinking and mushrooms with psychedelic effects.
